data.message: I hate having to go back to most recent from top stories. ....and i liked fb alot more before all the changes.

replies.message: Hey Arthur. We're sorry to hear that. We've invested a lot to understand how News Feed can show the most engaging content to the majority of people. Top Stories is the result of our findings, which is why it is the default. We know that some people prefer the Most Recent view, so we've kept this option available. If you have specific thoughts you want to share, please let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1rmVirO -Ryan

I've had a private photo stolen from me and used on a businesses page. It's been over 8 hours since I submitted my copyright infringment request to take it down. What gives? This photo is mine, of my twin sons on a skeezy page. They are minors and I did not authorize the use of this photo on their like page. Now some random person in Eqypt is using my photo of my kids as their profile picture and it's been shared almost 300 times. I am the photographer, they are my children and want it removed. WHO CAN HELP ME? I tried calling the number in your FAQ and I got routed to a place where I was hung up on. I feel like my children are in danger, people are claiming that my kids are their own. This is scaring me. This photo was set to friends only, I have no idea how they obtained the photo. Here is the link to the page. What are you doing about pages like this? https://www.facebook.com/Stylisheve/photos/a.222355147805074.61878.102313626475894/1064198150287432/?type=1&comment_id=1064486993591881&reply_comment_id=1065416346832279&offset=0&total_comments=436¬if_t=photo_reply
